title: The Easiest Joke Skin Ever.
body: Spent a hour photoshopping this. Just give Garen a powdered wig, a oversided gavel, and switch "DEMACIA!" with, 'DEMOCRACY!'.  It helps that he already screams "JUSTICE!" when he ults too.

replies.body: Judge Garen, Bringing the gavel down on evil!
But... but democracy and justice aren't even *remotely* relevant to one another. :P
Garen's Judgement deals massive amounts of DPS(Demacias Per Second)
Democracies Per Second*
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=80YFtnTBApU
Mate. Remove the formating, mate.
Mate. Use your willpower to press one button, mate.

You respond to me without knowing how his post looked like 9 hours ago. :)

And it looked like this:

>[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=80YFtnTBApU)
They are the similar in one aspect: They are both required to be a decent and morally good culture.
it is in 'MERICA
Republican Darius, then?
Nah, Senator Darius. Another senator you wouldn't want to fuck with.
see this skin would literally make my year, all i think about now is garen yelling "democracy" lolololol

http://objection.mrdictionary.net/go.php?n=7981054

(Sorry...had to do it.)
They'd probably make him yell "COMMUNISM!!" in China.
this is the reason this skin will never be made
To be fair, Demacia is more of an oligarchy. They do have a monarch, but there are a few houses who have lots of political power.

Whenever I see or hear the word "democracy", I immediately switch it out for "Damacy" in my head, and start thinking of this:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NwmDUVxBxA0&index=3&list=PL7BFF43EB8FCD4A38
Rito, please.
DEMOCRACIA*
I would buy this.
Nice haha xD
This is just
Judgement garen + Judgement Kayle?
Also want J4 to scream America everytime he ults, and change his E to a flag.
Great skin idea but really, a whole hour devoted to this simple photoshop my god that's atrocious D:

You don't know how hard it was to find gavel photos without watermarks. That and I had to photoshop the wig off of some random judge too, let alone make sure it doesn't overlap Garen. But yeah it was 4 am in the morning what do you expect. xD
Alright I chuckled. Fine, Ill admit that much
Really thought that's "Definitely not Jayce" Garen skin. Or the other way around.
i love this
LOL, give him a suit similar to Tahm Kench's with a blue tie, that would be perfect.
Riot, You gotta add this.
Change his weapon to a hammer and rename his ult to 'Hammertime'
